generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, curving to the left, and cars driving on it.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the building, with a curb separating it from the road.
- building: A large stone building with windows and architectural details is prominently visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are visible along both sides of the road and in the background.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the side of the road, including a black SUV and a gold SUV on the right, and several other cars on the left.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign (with a 'P') is visible on a pole attached to the building on the right side of the road.
